title: 2012년 United States v. Troy Powell 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. Troy Powell. 판결일: 2012-08-20. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Troy Naman POWELL, A/K/A Troy Norman Powell, Defendant-Appellant
**판결일**: 2012-08-20
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: King, Niemeyer, Wilkinson

## 변호인

ARGUED: Milton Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Rudolf, Widenhouse & Fialko, Chapel Hill, North Carolina, for Appellant. Amy Elizabeth Ray, Office of the United.States Attorney, Asheville, North Carolina, for Appellee. ON BRIEF: Anne M. Tompkins, United States Attorney, Charlotte, North Carolina, for Appellee.

## 인용

- 691 F.3d 554

## 판결문 요약

                       PUBLISHED


UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS
             FOR THE FOURTH CIRCUIT


UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,             
                Plaintiff-Appellee,
               v.
                                           No. 11-6152
TROY NAMAN POWELL, a/k/a Troy
Norman Powell,
             Defendant-Appellant.
                                      
        Appeal from the United States District Court
 for the Western District of North Carolina, at Statesville.
            Richard L. Voorhees, District Judge.
       (5:03-cr-00037-RLV-13; 5:10-cv-00137-RLV)

                  Argued: May 18, 2012

                 Decided: August 20, 2012

      Before WILKINSON, NIEMEYER, and KING,
                   Circuit Judges.



Affirmed by published opinion. Judge Niemeyer wrote the
opinion, in which Judge Wilkinson joined. Judge King wrote
an opinion dissenting in part and concurring in the judgment
in part.


                        COUNSEL

ARGUED: Milton Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., RUDOLF,
WIDENHOUSE & FIALKO, Chapel Hill, North Carolina, for
 2                  UNITED STATES v. POWELL
Appellant. Amy Elizabeth Ray, OFFICE OF THE UNITED
STATES ATTORNEY, Asheville, North Carolina, for Appel-
lee. ON BRIEF: Anne M. Tompkins, United States Attorney,
Charlotte, North Carolina, for Appellee.


                         OPINION

NIEMEYER, Circuit Judge:

   In 2004, Troy Powell was convicted of conspiracy to pos-
sess with intent to distribute at least 5 kilograms of coc...
